medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The older brother first showed symptoms suggestive of adrenal insufficiency at age 2.8 years but was diagnosed during an adrenal crisis at age 4.1 years. The younger brother was diagnosed with adrenal insufficiency at age 2.5 years while asymptomatic. Symptoms included recurrent vomiting, electrolyte imbalances, and hypoglycemia.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The older brother had a history of obstructive bronchopneumonia and episodes of vomiting with diagnosed hypotonic dehydration and ketotic hypoglycemia. The younger brother experienced febrile convulsions during infection episodes. Both were eventually diagnosed with adrenal insufficiency.
medical_history.family_history: The family is of Turkish descent with a maternal uncle who died at age 9 during an episode labeled as febrile seizure.
